document_data.name: Chalaska Muruin
document_data.mainbody: '''Chalaska Muruin''' was the unofficial ruler of [[Bargewright Inn]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Muruin was the master of the gate guards of the Inn and acted as unofficial ruler under orders of a cabal of plutocratic business owners, most of whom were in the pockets of
the [[Zhentarim]].
